itemDescription: naval architect, marine surveyor, yachtsman and author.

wikipedia_page.main: Edward Cecil Allcard (31 October 1914 – 28 July 2017) was an English naval architect, marine surveyor, yachtsman and author. He was the first person to cross the Atlantic single-handed in both directions, and wrote several books about his pioneering sailing adventures.

response: * October 31 – Edward Allcard, British architect and yachtsman (died 2017)
* Edward Allcard; 1957–1973; circumnavigation via the three great capes aboard his 36-foot wooden ketch Sea Wanderer.
